title: The item that supports really need

replies.body:

"No Vayne, you aren't allowed to 2v1 towerdive them! Even if they have low health!"
http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/steven-universe/images/8/8c/You_can%27t_tell_me_what_to_do.gif/revision/latest?cb=20160707233242?noredirect
"C'mon man, that Swain has only 25% HP, let's towerdive him NOW!"

"Oh alright then"

**Uses ult but towards base**

"Get in the taxi"

**Ends up in base**

Vayne: "Fuck you Tahm"

http://i.imgur.com/tmJGXAR.gif

rip the size

Main reason I mained Kench is to stop adc's from doing stupid things.

With other supports I could save my adc from everything but themselves,
with Kench I can save them from everything, including themselves.

> [{quoted}](name=I UnbenchedKench,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zAn2Mln3,comment-id=00010004,timestamp=2016-12-11T16:01:44.564+0000)
>
> Main reason I mained Kench is to stop adc's from doing stupid things.
> 
> With other supports I could save my adc from everything but themselves,
> with Kench I can save them from everything, including themselves.

There was a Heimerdinger in a recent game I played who consistently over stayed in team fights. I told him such, and when he disregarded it the next team fight, down the hatch.

Yeah the braindead point and click out of jail card.

God i hate this fucker saving people that lost a 1v1...
(them + tahm) vs. you = 1 v 1? Sounds like you're salty you can't 2v1 anyone you want.

What is it with everyone arguing with every single point i make here?

You people are clearly ignoring the fact that i never said 2v1 for fuck's sake i said that he SAVES SOMEONE FROM A 1V1 AS IN YOU NEVER **EVEN CONSIDERED THE POSSIBILITY THAT THE WORD S.A.V.E DOESN'T MEAN 2V1 EVERY TIME?!**

If you used your brain a little, then i clearly meant a scenario when Tahm just steps in and devours the ally. Fucking sick of your bandwagon hate cuz i have downvotes for no reason other than the same bullshit you just said.
If Tahm kills the person you're trying to kill, it was never a 1v1. That's how counting works. It doesn't matter how little he contributed, if he showed up it wasn't a 1v1.

So if Zed fights Syndra and Zed escapes by a Tahm flashing in and devouring him to save from Syndra's ult, it's a 1v1 that Tahm saved. You're just bullshitting me to make a fucking senseless point. It was a 1v1 that he saved.

If Soraka ults to save an ally from ignite, was it a 2v1? Ofcourse it fucking wasn't, Soraka didn't put any effort in and it was easy as hell to do for her. Same for Tahm.

That's what a save is - getting someone out of their fuckups. It's not a 1v2. 1v2 requires Tahm to actually do something to the opponent like Exhaust for example.
Sad but true
"Nononono Jinx don't towerdive the Ashe and Nautilus"

Draven sees low health Jhin with Leona that has ult and Q. I know what he's going to do. I red ping red ping red ping. Don't do it. You have so much to live for Draven. Think of all your adoring fans. Don't throw it all away!

*speed buffs*

Draven no! It isn't worth it! Stop! Turn back!

"An ally has been slain!"

Draven: "fckin worthless support"

*sigh*
Your Draven just didn't Draven Dravenly enough. As a support, you need to Dravenize to Dravensate for his his Dravenality.
I think you mean his Dravensanity.
He means towerdive and take the shot in the ass so Draven can get his stacks.
Man this is too common in games recently, lol.

I think you mean this:
http://www.geeky-gadgets.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/Toytaser.jpg

Don't junglers need a leash too?
http://i.huffpost.com/gen/2149286/images/o-FACEBOOK-facebook.jpg
{{champion:99}} leashing {{champion:106}} ?
We have something like that already, it's called GRAB THE FUCKING LANTERN!!!!!!!

That requires them to click, too much effort.
The most they might do is just sit on top of it taunt spamming. 

{{champion:67}}- "Lelelel outplayed, rekt, scrubs, git gud"

"An ally has been slain!"

{{champion:67}}- "WTF thresh wow noob"

{{champion:412}}- ...

Storytime:

I was playing Sivir a couple games ago with a Braum Support. Braum told me that if I died once he would go support top because he needs an S. Three deaths later, he's raging at me for letting him die.

Like... isn't your job to make me not die? Sorry but if you're dying in lane as Braum a couple 100AD auto attacks isn't gonna do much.

Yeah, supports come in just as toxic flavors as ADCs.
Not as often, but some of them aren't very nice to their ADCs and like to assume all of them are stupid and braindead from the start.

I personally give all ADCs the benefit of the doubt, save for Vaynes, who I have a particularly keen eye on. They make me too nervous to treat them equally. Otherwise, I'm cool with you until you start blaming me for everything, then we have a problem.

There was one lane Jhin told me to pick Blitzcrank against Morgana and he began to get angry at me for dying so much, I got angry at him for convincing me to do such a bad pick, then we got a double kill and turned the tables. Botlane was filled with sunshine and positive marks for the rest of the game.
I love the psychology of this game. So hilarous

No, the closest thing we have is devour.

http://pm1.narvii.com/5954/035e349e3362892fbc8fe7cc4e69d1e8325ed920_hq.jpg http://orig12.deviantart.net/e156/f/2013/108/e/2/thresh_is_getting_tired_of_your_crap_by_skitzopheliac-d6257e4.jpg http://orig15.deviantart.net/6810/f/2013/125/e/3/grab_the_lantern_by_risu_ruru-d6464tl.png

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} 

As a supp main, I agree.
It should function like a {{champion:240}} Q that's permanently tethered to an ally.  Every time your Vayne starts tumbling after the enemy team into Fog of War... yank.
More like a shock collar. Every-time ADC steps out of position, give 'em a little current running through their body. =w=
I hope I never get matched with you when I Draven...
Well, you're level 17. The chances of us being matched together are as likely as the Kardashians using their brains.

Ihave 14 smurfs ranging from Bronze to Gold ._.

But I like that joke
Sounds like a lot of people in here need to learn how to properly tower dive.
